changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE medic_kg.doctors ( id serial PRIMARY KEY not null, username varchar(255) not null, email varchar(255) not null, avatar varchar(255) not null, gender varchar(30) not null , date_birthday timestamp not null, password varchar(255) not null, role_id int not null, inn varchar(255) not null, experience varchar(555) not null, full_info varchar(500) not null, short_info varchar(135) not null, city varchar(255) not null, country varchar(255) not null, visit_price int DEFAULT 0, home_visit_price int DEFAULT 0, is_pediatrist BOOLEAN default FALSE, is_family_doctor BOOLEAN default FALSE, is_certificated BOOLEAN default FALSE, is_private_practice BOOLEAN default FALSE, CONSTRAINT fk_roles_users FOREIGN KEY(role_id) REFERENCES medic_kg.roles(id) );
